      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_18494aaee6b46d5a82a476e3d46ed60e53c0f12a</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_18494aaee6b46d5a82a476e3d46ed60e53c0f12a</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Calculating turning force moments of a seesaw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berechnung der drehenkraftmomente eines Seesaw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calcul des moments de rotation de force d'une 
balançoir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calculando momentos de giro da força de um 
balanço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcolazione dei momenti di rotazione della forza
di un'altalena</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπολογισμός των γυρίζοντας στιγμών δύναμης seesaw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calcular momentos de la fuerza que dan vuelta de 
un balancín</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the force diagram of a see-saw. This can be used as an exercise to calculate for the moment or turning effect of the forces involved in a force diagram.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">see-saw</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Kraftdiagramm eines 
See-saw. Dieses kann als Übung verwendet werden, um für den 
Moment oder den dreheneffekt der Kräfte zu errechnen, die in ein 
Kraftdiagramm mit einbezogen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le diagramme de force 
d'une balançoir. Ceci peut être employé comme exercice pour 
calculer pour le moment ou l'effet de rotation des forces impliquées 
dans un diagramme de force.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o diagrama da força de 
um balanço. Isto pode ser usado como um exercício calcular 
para o momento ou o efeito de giro das forças envolvidas em um 
diagrama da força.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra lo schema della forza
di un'altalena. Ciò può essere usata come esercitazione per 
calcolare per il momento o l'effetto di rotazione delle forze addette 
ad uno schema della forza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ότι το διάγραμμα δύναμης
βλέπει. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση που
υπολογίζει για τη στιγμή ή τη γυρίζοντας επίδραση των δυνάμεων 
που περιλαμβάνονται σε ένα διάγραμμα δύναμης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el diagrama de la 
fuerza de un balancín. Esto se puede utilizar como ejercicio 
para calcular para el momento o el efecto que da vuelta de las fuerzas
implicadas en un diagrama de la fuerza.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Moment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">See-saw</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">drehenkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">moment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">balançoir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force de rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">momento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">balanço</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força de giro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">peso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">momento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">altalena</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza di rotazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">peso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στιγμή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δείτε</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γυρίζοντας δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βάρος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">momento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">balancín</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza que da vuelta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">peso</string>
          </keyword>
